AppLU is a widget application\n

To make it work, 
just add it to your home screen. 
After adding first widget, you'll be able 
to launch or uninstall your apps 
directly from your home screen. 

You can choose between layouts in size:
 S, M or L

1. Name of the currently selected app 
2. Index of the current app and number of found apps 
3. Last apps ran from AppLU. You can click to run any of them 
4. Launch button - runs currently selected app 
5. Uninstall button - removes currently selected app 
6. App filter button - switch between user/system/all 
7. Letter buttons - click on them to find your app 
8. Delete buttons - remove last or all letters from the filter

How to use the widgets?

Using the letter buttons (7) is very easy. Just spell app name that you're trying to find, locate appropriate letters and click on them! 
That's it. 
If one letter is not enough, add another one and another one, until the app is found. 
If there are multiple results, just click on the app name field (1) and the next one will appear.
